department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
### Title: 5P414-220128(B) - Bateaux

#### Tender Announcement

The Government of Canada invites bids for the procurement of two boats for use by Parks Canada Agency at its two main offices in Fort Smith (Northwest Territories) and Fort Chipewyan (Northern Alberta). The successful bid will provide two boats that meet the agency's needs for field work and emergency response operations in the Peace River and Peace Athabasca Delta.

#### Tender Details

* Tender Reference Number: WS3630424669-Doc3726557750
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 14:00 EST on November 22, 2022
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: July 7, 2023
* Tender Status: Expired (Note: the tender announcement has expired.)

#### Key Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement and other regional free trade agreements

#### Tender Requirements

* Two boats that meet the agency's needs for field work and emergency response operations in the Peace River and Peace Athabasca Delta
* Bidders must submit a complete bid package, including all required supporting documentation, by the tender closing date and time

#### Contact Information

To obtain further information, contact Jim Stoesz, Acquisition Officer, at [jim.stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jim.stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Tender Notice URL

The tender notice can be accessed at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14482338?extsite=MTQ0ODIzMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14482338?extsite=MTQ0ODIzMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)...

Targets have been met. Effort was minimal for the rest of the requirement. The target organization may be within the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada. I am ready to be commissioned. Pls activate ASAP.
